channel.title: Creative Arts Emmys on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in Creative Arts Emmys on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Shawn Hatosy and Merritt Wever Win for Best Guest Acting in a Drama
item.description: Hatosy won for his role as Dr. Jack Abbot in ‘The Pitt’ and Wever her portrayal of Gretchen George on ‘Severance.’

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Shawn Hatosy and Merritt Wever Win for Best Guest Acting in a Drama
item.description: Hatosy won for his role as Dr. Jack Abbot in ‘The Pitt’ and Wever her portrayal of Gretchen George on ‘Severance.’

item.title: ‘White Lotus’ Composer Wins Emmy After Mike White Fallout
item.description: Cristobal Tapia de Veer, who parted ways with the HBO drama and its creator earlier this year, won the award for best original main title theme music.

item.title: ‘White Lotus’ Composer Wins Emmy After Mike White Fallout
item.description: Cristobal Tapia de Veer, who parted ways with the HBO drama and its creator earlier this year, won the award for best original main title theme music.

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys, Night One: Full List of Winners
item.description: Julianne Nicholson, Bryan Cranston, Merritt Wever and Shawn Hatosy are among the night’s early winners for ‘Hacks,’ ‘The Studio,’ ‘Severance’ and ‘The Pitt,’ respectively.

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys, Night One: Full List of Winners
item.description: Julianne Nicholson, Bryan Cranston, Merritt Wever and Shawn Hatosy are among the night’s early winners for ‘Hacks,’ ‘The Studio,’ ‘Severance’ and ‘The Pitt,’ respectively.

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Bryan Cranston and Julianne Nicholson Win for Guest Acting in a Comedy Series
item.description: Cranston won for his role as Griffin Mill in ‘The Studio’ and Nicholson for her portrayal of Dance Mom on ‘Hacks.’

item.title: Creative Arts Emmys: Bryan Cranston and Julianne Nicholson Win for Guest Acting in a Comedy Series
item.description: Cranston won for his role as Griffin Mill in ‘The Studio’ and Nicholson for her portrayal of Dance Mom on ‘Hacks.’

item.description: Julianne Nicholson and Bryan Cranston are among the night’s early winners for ‘Hacks’ and ‘The Studio,’ respectively.

item.title: Corporation for Public Broadcasting to Receive 2025 Governors Award at Creative Arts Emmys
item.description: And boy, does it need the gold right now.
